title: One Last Surprise (15R33)
text:
Set:	The Hunters
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event • Skirmish
Game Text:	Spell. Spot Gandalf and an unbound companion skirmishing a minion to use Gandalf's resistance to resolve that skirmish instead of that companion's strength.
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Typo on physical card (“minnion”).
